resources.string: Every party needs a name.\nYour friends need to know which party to join and I need a name to store party data you can later retrieve.
Tell your friends to join your party from the main menu. Devices will appear below. Tap devices to add them to the group.
Something prevented creation of the "listen" socket. This is required to let other devices talk to me. Without it, I cannot even start creating the party.
I cannot create the "heroes gather here" service. There\'s nothing I can do about it.\n(Error %1$s)
Looks like the Network Service Discovery is unavailable. I require this thing to let your friends join the party.
The party will be visible to all devices on the same network.
Say something so the party owner can recognize you
I\'m scanning the network for hero groups. Groups will appear below.
Cannot find your group?\nTry an explicit connection!
Something has gone wrong with network discovery (error %1$s)
Are your friends having trouble in finding your group? Here is data to use "explicit connect":\n

To attempt a specific connection you need two pieces of information. The first is the address of the device you want to connect to. This isn\'t easy to get: the group owner might have to look for it in device settings. If a friend already connected you can ask him.
The second information you need is a port. It\'s the number at the bottom of the screen on group owner device.
